title: Plaza = The Beach
creator_credit: Edward Sturlis, Andrzej Jozwikiewicz and Studio Malych Form Filmowych Se-Ma-For
brief_description: Two cheeky tattoos escape from the chests of two sailors to wreak havoc on unsuspecting sunbathers, returning when the pace of their pranks gets out of hand. A comic short film, effectively combining real life with animation.
creator_credit_for_label: Edward Sturlis, Andrzej Jozwikiewicz and Studio Malych Form Filmowych Se-Ma-For
